text: The Pokiok Bridge is a cable-stayed suspension bridge crossing the Saint John River near Nackawic, New Brunswick, Canada. Built in 1967, to replace the Hawkshaw Bridge which had been demolished, the bridge has a main span of 217 m (713 ft). title: Hawkshaw Bridge
